* [[Lou Boudreau]] ([[Thornton Township High School|Thornton HS]]) â¢ announcer and Hall-of-Fame baseball player â¢ led his high school basketball team to 1933 state title and to second place in 1934 and 1935. * [[Jim Brewer (basketball)|Jim Brewer]] ([[Proviso East High School|Proviso East HS]]) â¢ basketball player and coach â¢ led his team to the 1969 state basketball title before playing for the [[Basketball at the 1972 Summer Olympics|1972 Olympic team]], and playing and coaching in the [[NBA]].<ref>[http://www.ihsa.org/initiatives/legends/ IHSA Basketball legends identifying Jim Brewer]</ref>
